title: A platform that facilitates renting at the speed of now!
about_us_description: We were students who still remember memories, people and experiences that marked our journey. We are grateful for those moments. Our purpose serves to inspire and contribute so that this academic journey is marked by the ideal accommodation.
our_history_description: Unihosts was born in September 2020, in the middle of the pandemic, in Jo√£o's room, in Baleal. One of the biggest challenges that existed at the time was finding a room at the University in a simple way. Through local student associations we realized that there was a need to simplify this process. After some tests we decided to make it happen. We are counting on you to publicize and expand this movement! THANK YOU!!
mission_decription: We want students to find their ideal room in a practical, effective and safe way! We intend to clarify the digital offer of available accommodation in order to consolidate functional harmony between owners and students.
values_description: We believe that accommodation and all those involved in the university chapter are important in our lives. As a community, we want to continually explore new ideas, processes and solutions. We value simplicity, transparency and commitment in order to bring people together.
